name: Summary Stock With Ordered
query:
select  
 tabItem.item_code as "Code::70",
 tabItem.item_code as "Code:Link/Item:70",
 tabItem.item_name as "Item Name::200",
 tabItem.description as "Item Description::200",
 tabItem.item_group as "Item Group::150",
 tabItem.brand as "Brand::80",
 tabBin.actual_qty AS "Current:Float",
 tabBin.reserved_qty AS "Ordered:Float",
 ifnull((tabBin.actual_qty - tabBin.reserved_qty),0) as "Avilable:Float",
 ifnull(`tabItem Price`.price_list_rate,0) as "Price:Currency:100",
  tabBin.warehouse as "warehouse::200"
from
 tabBin 
inner join tabItem on tabBin.item_code = tabItem.item_code left join `tabItem Price` on tabBin.item_code = `tabItem Price`.item_code join tabWarehouse on tabBin.warehouse= tabWarehouse.name
where
 `tabItem Price`.price_list =  (select value from tabSingles where field = "selling_price_list" and doctype ="Selling Settings")
and tabWarehouse.summery_stock =1
